synopsis.text: Characters Kite and Black Rose, won in a special campaign by twins Shugo and Rena, hold secrets that lead them on a perilous journey in the MMORPG 'The World.' As new players, they team up with friends Ouka, Mirelle, Hotaru, and Sanjuro to face mysterious monsters causing real-world comas. Shugo's unique ability, Data Drain, and his bracelet are their keys to unraveling the game's hidden truths and saving it from the Twilight incident's consequences. The siblings must confront the dangers and uncover why they are being targeted to prevent further catastrophe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
